Name: Zombie Clicker Defense
About the game: A simple tower defense clicker to defend the base from a zombie invasion. Improve your defense, build up the attack and speed of your combat units. Collect rage by killing zombies and spend on to call up reinforcements. Hire new soldiers and send them into battle with an inordinately growing army of various walking creatures.
